issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: RM failover lead to failure to recognize previously running application attempt

comments.body:
Hi [~cindy2012], which version of hadoop build are you using? In older version i.e 2.4, RM HA introduced.It was not meant for recovering running jobs.
Work preserving restart feature done in YARN-556. If you are already using latest version then configuring peroperty {{yarn.resourcemanager.work-preserving-recovery.enabled}} enables work preserving for running jobs.
As mentioned by [~rohithsharma], this problem should be addressed after  YARN-556. Please reopen it if you still have the problem.
